name: A Universe From Nothing A Text Adventure Game
name_original: A Universe From Nothing A Text Adventure Game
description:
I always wanted to create a short sci-fi text adventure game that was rather forgiving to the player. That allowed the player to progress forward, pick many choices in a given scene, and just have fun regardless of the outcome.

 

This was created over a course of a week as a side project. While some light changes might be made this is considered done.
